_header: Sitting on this see / Justice look thow steadfast be
Subjects: judges, advice to; advice, to judges
_description: Advice to justices to be steadfast, from Trevisa’s Polychronicon (Book III, chapter 8) — four couplets

BLAdd24194.First Lines: Sittynge on þis seeJustice lok þu stedefast be…
BLAdd24194.Last Lines: …þu sittest ȝitsone þerforere fader y sitte

HunHM28561.Transcription:
Sitting on þis seeIustice loke þou stedfaste bekepe
                    honde and yeresfrom yifte and from mennys praiersTake lanterne
                    laweliȝt vnder skynne to draweÞou sittest yettsone
                    þere for fader y sette
